welcome.title: Start your journey
welcome.content: We are thrilled to have you on board. Your account has been successfully set up, and you now have access to our platform's premium tools.

verification.subject: Verify your email
verification.title: Security Confirmation
verification.content: To ensure your account integrity and access all features, we need to confirm this email address belongs to you.
verification.securityNote: If you didn't request this verification, please disregard this email.

resetPassword.subject: Password Reset
resetPassword.title: Access Recovery
resetPassword.content: We received a request to reset your account password. If this was you, click the button to create a new secure credential.
resetPassword.securityNote: This link expires in 1 hour for security. If this wasn't you, we recommend contacting support.

invite.subject: Invite: Join {{tenantName}}
invite.title: You've been invited
invite.content: {{inviterName}} has invited you to collaborate in the {{tenantName}} organization. Accept the invite to start working together.

invoice.subject: Invoice #{{invoiceNumber}} is available
invoice.title: New Invoice Generated
invoice.content: Your invoice for the last period is now ready, totaling {{amount}}. The due date is scheduled for {{dueDate}}.

otp.subject: Your verification code: {{code}}
otp.title: Two-Factor Authentication
otp.content: Use the code below to complete your login. Never share this code with anyone.

security.subject: Security Alert: New Login Detected
security.title: New Account Access
security.content: We detected a new login to your Kaven account. If this was you, no action is needed.

paymentFailed.subject: Action Required: Payment Failed
paymentFailed.title: Payment Pending
paymentFailed.content: We were unable to process your subscription payment. To avoid service interruption, please update your payment method.
